indexterm.see: ISO Entity Sets, Numeric and Special Graphic

refmeta.refentrytitle: Numeric and Special Graphic Character Entities (%isonum;)

refnamediv.refpurpose: Numeric and Special Graphic Character Entities

refsynopsisdiv.para:
The %isonum; parameter entity includes the ISO character entities with the public identifier:
ISO 8879:1986//ENTITIES Numeric and Special Graphic//EN

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: ISO and the W3C are cooperating to provide an official set of character entity references for XML. A description of this set is available at
